title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin off, Doug Gottlieb steps in to explain where everything went wrong for the Colts as they look for another franchise quarterback following the Carson Wentz trade. He defends LeBron James from the criticism about passing on the potential game winning shot but feels there was something to fairly question him on. Plus, former NFL QB Brock Huard joined the show to tell Doug what went wrong between Russell Wilson and the Seahawks that led their break up this week. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
